name: MPACEDAO #167
description: Fantasy Bear NFT is a collection of 5,000 unique characters. They are adventurers who like to be close to nature and are loyal friends of Mpace; the rarity is divided into 4 levels, of which, 5% of the legendary, they have handsome clothes , with unique glasses, hats, cute expressions, rich colors and the largest number of fruits in the background, they want to live with us in a fantastic world and protect each other.
